attributes.action: Mr Bruce Forsyth for a Knighthood{Please]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Could you please put Mr Bruce Forsyth forward for a Knighthood. He really does deserve it, he is a true gent and has been a wonderful entertainer, to us all here in the U.K.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
